args:
After a physician informs Sylas and Luca
about a particular type of medicinal herb,
they find themselves climbing a tall mountain
in search of it.
Okay, this one's GOTTA be it.
And if it reacts as we were told it does,\nI should finally be able to finish my\nhealing aromatic!
I thought myself well-versed in wild herbs\nand the like, but here we are finding one\nI wasn't even aware of.
Then let's snatch it up and beat feet home.
Luca, are you all right?! Here, let me\nadminister treatment for that wound.
Can't believe I let a chump sneak up\non me like tha—YEEEOOOOWWCH!

This wound is much deeper than I thought.
And we'll surely lose the sun should we
attempt to go back down the mountain
while you're injured like this.
We'll just have to make camp here\nand wait for morning.
Here, I found water at a nearby spring.
If your wound pains you, I suggest rest.
Love to, but I'm way too worked up\nto hit the hay right now.
How's about we talk about old times\nuntil I finally nod off?
Yes, that sounds agreeable.\nWhat should we talk about?
How about that time you entered an\narchery competition with me and Laranoa\nand ended up all teary-eyed?
Okay, how about when the three of us went\ninto that dark cave and you were basically\non the verge of tears the entire time?
Well then, how about when you\nand me and Laranoa met?
I find that acceptable. Let me see...\nGoodness, how long ago was that?
I know we were about half as tall\nas we are now.
And I think it was the first time either of us\nattended the Vernal Banquet.
I slipped off when my mom wasn't looking\nto check out festival stuff on my own.
And that's when I met Laranoa!\nShe'd given her folks the slip, too.
I, however, had become accidentally\nseparated from my parents and had\nno idea what to do with myself.
But then you and Laranoa found me\nand decided to help.
I think we just played for a few hours\nuntil our parents finally tracked us down.\nMan, were they ever sore...
Anyway, that's what started our friendship!
Every year, we'd meet up at the banquet to\nplay and come up with pranks or whatever.
The pranks were only because you two\ntroublemakers tempted me into it.
But in time, I became busy with my\nresearch and I was no longer able to\nleave the village.
And with Laranoa working on becoming\nthe next chief, the three of us weren't able\nto hang together anymore.
And just when I thought that would be the\nend of our relationship, here we find\nourselves huddled around a fire.
It has been quite the fellowship. *sniff*
Hey, are you tearing up? Ha ha!\nI guess some things never change.
...It's time for you to sleep.\nI shall keep watch.
Well, I'm actually getting tired,\nso I think I'll take you up on that.
Oh dear, I fear I fell asleep on my watch.\nSeems there's still some time left\nuntil daybreak, so I'll just... Huh?
I-it's nothin' I can't... Urk! Gaaah!
It is NOT nothing—you're also running\nan incredibly high fever!
I don't have the medicine to treat this;\nwe have to get you down the mountain.
We'll both end up dead if you try to\ndrag me all the way down this thing.
I will do no such thing.
C'mon, a guy as smart as you has gotta\nknow the score. Just get out of here and\nleave me for the worms already.
This is uncharacteristically weak-willed of\nyou to say that. Nevertheless, the answer\nis still a very firm ＂no.＂
You took command the day we met\nand dragged me into your life.
Now it is MY turn to do the dragging!
I am no longer the child you seem to\nthink I am. Now be quiet already!
Early morning, in the village\nat the foot of the mountains...
*yawn* Huh? Who's knockin' on m'door\nat this fool hour? ...Huh?!
Land sakes, you can barely stand!\nWho are you?!
Sweet mother of mercy, lookit that wound!
Please send word to the Halidom\nas soon as you can...
You see, Luca...? I'm...no longer the\nchild you think I am...
Hey! You all right, kid?\nI brought the doc!
C-Cleo? Am I back at the castle?\nDid you heal me?
Thankfully, yes. One of the villagers\ncame to us just in time.
The rest looked after you until we arrived.\nPerhaps you should thank them?
You bonehead! Injured people should shut\nup and ACT like injured people! Hiiii-ya!
Gaaah! Sarisse, it ain't fair to attack\nthe wounded!
His wound was grave, but after I applied\nhealing magic, he recovered all of his\nstrength and then some.
What's up, sleepyhead? Awake at last?
You look fit to pass back out yourself\nafter those hits from Sarisse.
Yeah, let's just leave that one alone.\nAnyway, I think you forgot somethin'.
I tossed everything I was carrying in order\nto move you. Did you pick these up?
You need 'em for your healing aromatic,\nyeah? I had to make sure they got home.
I should be the one thanking you.
I take it you'll be gettin' back to your\nresearch the second you're recovered?
And I take it you'll be assisting me?
'Course I will! We're gonna crack this\nnut if it's the last thing I do!
